definitions: a North American shrub of the rose family, with white flowers and red autumn foliage, cultivated as an ornamental.

notes.text: Genus Aronia, family Rosaceae: several species, especially the red chokeberry (A. arbutifolia), purple chokeberry (A. floribunda), and black chokeberry (A. melanocarpa), each named for the color of its fruits

shortDefinitions: North American shrub of rose family

definitions: the bitter scarlet berrylike fruit of the chokeberry.
shortDefinitions: bitter scarlet berrylike fruit of chokeberry
